It can make everyone at your work is super jealous, and it looks so festive on your desk! , the bulbs don’t get hot even after being plugged in for 12 hours! It’s a great charger , you’ll definitely be using all year!
 Specifications: 
1.LED Qty: 10 pcs 
2.Light color: White Red Green Yellow Blue 
3. Total Length: 50 inch 
4.only charge function. 
5. If you have any problem with this item, please contact us directly, and we’ll provide help.

1x Christmas light phone charger
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.02 x 2.2 x 1.46 inches; 1.76 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 16, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ WIND
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07Z92TLD8

1. In test on the iPhone XS, charging took just 3 hours to fully charge Durable portable and easy to use with any charging port 50inch USB cable with 10 LED multicolored festive lights that will illuminate when in use.
2. The LED Christmas Lights charging cable is a fun way to ensure your iPhone always has enough electricity.
3. Stayed powered up while on-the-go! Plug in this USB cable in the car, at the office, at home—just about anywhere!
4. This USB and bulb charger can be plugged into your computer or car. Lights up when plugged in as it charges your phone,provides a festive glow.
5. Warranty for 360 days from date of purchase,If you have any question about our goods, pls feel free to contact with us and we will supply you best after-service. Compatible with most iPhones 5/5s, 6/6s/Plus, 7/7s/Plus, 8/Plus, X/XR/XS/XS Max, 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max& iPad. The Christmas lights charging cable is the best unique gift for anyone.

Product Description

Compatibility List:

Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G, S22 Plus 5G, S22 5G, S21 Ultra 5G, S21 Plus 5G, S21 FE, S21 5G, S20 Ultra 5G, S20 Plus 5G, S20 5G, S20 FE

Samsung Galaxy S10, S10 Plus, S10e, S9, S9 Plus, S9 Active, S8, S8+, S8 Active

Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra 5G, Note 20 5G, Note 10 Plus 5G, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8

Samsung Galaxy A02s, A03s, A03, A3, A5, A6, A7, A8, A9, A10, A10E, A11, A12

Samsung Galaxy A20, A21, A21s, A22, A31, A32, A40, A41, A42, A50, A51, A52, A53, A60, A70, A70s, A71 5G, A72, A80, A90

Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2/ Z Fold 3/ Z Fold 4/ Z Flip/ Z Flip 3/ Z Flip 4/ F52

Samsung Galaxy Tab A 8.0(2018), Tab A 10.1 (2019), Tab 10.5, Tab A 8.0

Google Pixel, Pixel 2, Pixel 3, Pixel XL

LG G5, G6, G7, V20, V30 ThinQ Plus

One Plus, HTC, ZTE Axon, Nexus 6p

Other USB Type C Device

INPUT:

100 – 240 VAC ; 50-60HZ 0.50A

OUTPUT

9V/1.67A ; 5V/2.00A

What is Adaptive Fast Charging

This technology allows the smartphone to be charged with a faster speed, battery can charge faster up to 75% .

Will this product charge other Android phones quickly?

Yes. As long as your device supports Quick Charge QC2.0 & QC3.0, our wall charger block with Type-C cable will charge your device at a fast manner.

What is the difference between Quick Charge (QC) and Adaptive Fast charging (ADC)?

They are basically the same technology but brands marketed in different name. While Qualcomm named it Quick Charge, Samsung named it Adaptive Fast Charging.

Safe Fast Charger & Sync

Fast charger delivers up to output current of 15W, 75% faster than standard chargers, it also has the sync feature, most importantly, it is made for safe charging, it can intelligently recognize the battery type and status, will automatically stop charging when fully charged to prevent from short circuit, over-current, over-voltage, over-heating and over-charging.

Perfect for Any Occasions

These fasting charging kit is great for home, office, restaurant, tour, hotel etc.

High Quality ABS Material

Made of ABS material for the charger shell, shockproof and protect from over-heating & short-circuit

Easy to Carry

Compact classic design is portable to carry anywhere, slim and lightweight

【Quick Charge 3.0 Rapid Charging】Adaptive type c fast charger, enables your battery from zero to 50% in just 30 minutes, 75% faster than standard chargers.
【Fast & Sync】 USB c cell phone wall charger kit charges Samsung phones and tablets with USB 2. 0 ports at max high speed of 480 Mbps. It also charge USB-C devices without the Fast Charging feature as well, with up to a 2 Amp charging rate. Besides, it also has data transfer feature for convenient usage.
【Wide Compatibility】Compatible AFC (Adaptive Fast Charging): Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra, S21 Plus, S21, S20 Ultra, S20 Plus, S20, S20 FE, S10, S10e, S10+, S9, S9+, S9 Active, S8, S8+, S8 Active, Galaxy Note 20 Ultra , Note 20 5G, Note 10+ 5G, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8, Galaxy A90, A80, A71 5G, A70s, A52, A51, A20, Galaxy Z Fold2, Z Fold2 5G, Z Flip, Z Flip 5G, Fold, GOOGLE Pixel 1, 2, 3, 6, Pixel XL, LG G5, G6, G7, V20, V30 ThinQ Plus, One Plus, HTC, ZTE Axon, Nexus 6p and other USB Type C Device
【Package List】Replace or refund within one year without return, lifetime technical support. Package included: 2x Wall Charger Plug Box Brick and 2x Type-C [ 6 Feet ] Cord.

Compatibility List:

Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G, S22 Plus 5G, S22 5G, S21 Ultra 5G, S21 Plus 5G, S21 FE, S21 5G, S20 Ultra 5G, S20 Plus 5G, S20 5G, S20 FE

Samsung Galaxy S10, S10 Plus, S10e, S9, S9 Plus, S9 Active, S8, S8+, S8 Active

Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra 5G, Note 20 5G, Note 10 Plus 5G, Note 10, Note 9, Note 8

Samsung Galaxy A02s, A03s, A03, A3, A5, A6, A7, A8, A9, A10, A10E, A11, A12

Samsung Galaxy A20, A21, A21s, A22, A31, A32, A40, A41, A42, A50, A51, A52, A53, A60, A70, A70s, A71 5G, A72, A80, A90

item.title: Future Call FC-2804 Big Button Phone for Seniors | 3 Picture Keys and Speakerphone | Amplified Telephones for Hearing Impaired Seniors 40db w/Extra Long 12′ Cord | Simple Landline Phones for Seniors
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Product Dimensions 8 x 8 x 4 inches Item Weight 1.46 pounds ASIN B095V3ZWYS Customer Reviews 3.9 out of 5 stars 365 ratings 3.9 out of 5 stars Best Sellers Rank #46,664 in Office Products (See Top 100 in Office Products) #157 in Landline Phones Date First Available July 8, 2021 Manufacturer Future Call Country ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Product Dimensions 8 x 8 x 4 inches
Item Weight 1.46 pounds
ASIN B095V3ZWYS
Customer Reviews

3.9 out of 5 stars

365 ratings

3.9 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #46,664 in Office Products (See Top 100 in Office Products)
#157 in Landline Phones
Date First Available July 8, 2021
Manufacturer Future Call
Country of Origin China

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $44.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:51:32 UTC – Details)


Standard telephones often have buttons that are too small to be identified or accurately pressed, especially for seniors. You’ve probably noticed your grandparents having trouble pressing the digits on your old home phone corded landline unit. Just because age tends to come with a host of difficulties doesn’t mean you should let your mom, dad, grandma, or grandpa suffer through such inconveniences. Luckily, we’ve got the perfect product to see them through their golden years. Give your seniors complete authority over their home phone with the Future Call FC-2804 Big Button Phone for Seniors. Future Call took the idea of sight impaired phones and amplified phones for hearing impaired seniors and merged them together creating perfect phones with big buttons for seniors. Designed with convenience and efficiency in mind, these house phones for seniors allow your loved ones to use big button & amplified telephones without assistance and makes a great corded phone for seniors. Aside from its large buttons, Future Call took an idea from their very popular picture phones for seniors and included it for the final touch. This big button telephone for seniors also features three one touch speed dial photo buttons that add a personal touch to the phone. These buttons also allows the user to dial saved contacts with ease. This way, they’ll be able to see who they’re calling very clearly and dial with just one push of a button. Furthermore, these telephones are designed to store emergency contacts efficiently. You’ll notice the 911, M1, and M2 buttons that allow you to save contacts for one touch speed dial only. You’ll also be able to pre-program up to 15 phone numbers as desired. Reasons to love our Simple landline phone for seniors: 1) Wall Mountable 2) Extra Long 12′ Handset cord 3) Loud telephone for hard of hearing 4) Big button phone for elderly 5) Phones that light up when ringing 6) Sight impaired phone 7) phones with big numbers 8) Hands Free Speakerphone
LARGE BUTTON PHONE FOR VISUALLY IMPAIRED SENIORS – Simple telephones for seniors are made with the convenience of senior citizens in mind and designed as an easy phone for seniors to operate and use. Its buttons are extra large for easy pressing and identification for those with limited eyesight. When the phone is ringing the red indicator light flashes. The Future Call FC-2804 large button phones for seniors brings comfort to those with limited eye site and aids them in their later years.
LOUD PHONE FOR HEARING IMPAIRED SENIORS – Our senior phone for elderly reaches 40db in handset volume. The handset includes a hi / low switch in which you can choose either 30db or 40db in volume. This is the normal range for most hearing impaired phones for elderly made for those who struggle with hearing impairment. Some seniors may have a severe situation and will need a corded phone that is built with higher db ranges. This is the exception for these house phones for seniors
MEMORY DIALING – Our large button phones for seniors includes 3 photo memory telephone buttons which are one touch speed dial, and also includes 2 additional one touch buttons M1 and M2 along with 10 other keys (0-9) that are one touch optional also making this a great dial phone for kids to call parents. Our landline phones for seniors make it very easy to program up to 15 memory buttons with emergency contacts to contact family or 911 with ease. Don’t worry, 911 key is reprogrammable.
TELEPHONE NUMBER STORAGE PROTECTION – These simple home phones for seniors come with a safe proof. After programing your picture phone buttons and your memory buttons, simply switch the STORE button, on the back of the phone, into the OFF position and nobody can accidentally program an undesired number. Simply switch it back into the ON position and resume programming. This house phone for seniors is powered by the landline and will keep your previously stored numbers safe during a power outage.
READ BEFORE PURCHASING – These Telephones for Seniors are corded phones for landline use and were primarily made for the elderly. This phone does not include caller id or voicemail. This corded telephone is a desktop phone and is wall mountable. This phone works great when connected to a Cable TV / Internet modem but is not a SIP VOIP phone. This phone includes an extra long 12′ cord. This landline phone for seniors includes a hands free speakerphone with volume control for elderly.

4
Price: $44.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:51:32 UTC – Details)

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {

loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;

onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,

);

From the manufacturer

BELKIN SURGE PROTECTOR

Direct Data Line Protection

* Adding to the 12 surge-protected outlets, the power strip features coaxial protection for your cable or satellite connections.

* With 1-in-2-out RJ11 input where you can directly plug in your telephone or fax machine to secure it against surges and voltage spikes.

Strong Surge Protection

Rated to withstand up to 3,940 joules, this surge suppressor is your premium power protection for your professional workstations, laser printers, broadband modems, and everyday household electronics.

Child Safety Sliding Locks

Each outlet has a sliding safety cover that closes when it is not in use. The covers also prevent dusts and other small particles from entering the socket.

Easily Fits in Different Areas

Equipped with a space-saving flat AC plug for enhanced flexibility and a durable 8 feet cord convenient for hard-to-reach wall receptacles.

Durable and Enduring Build

The Oversized Metal Oxide Varistors (MOVs) absorb excess electricity, and damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust while preventing dents and scratches.

Multi-Outlet Surge Protector Power Strip: Power everything on your desk with a single compact surge-protected extension cord. This reputable power cord offers 12 AC outlets with surge protector for charging your computer, laptop, phone, camera, and more. One charging station for a clutter-free desk.

Power Bar with Phone Line Protection: Featuring a 1-in-2-out RJ11 telephone or fax protection to ensure open and continuous phone line connections. It also provides a coaxial cable protection to safeguard cable box and satellite connections. The damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust.

Power Bar with Phone Line Protection: Featuring a 1-in-2-out RJ11 telephone or fax protection to ensure open and continuous phone line connections. It also provides a coaxial cable protection to safeguard cable box and satellite connections. The damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust.

Compact, Heavy Duty, and Space-Saving: The widely spaced outlets give ample area to fit big plugs and charger bricks. Its slender design makes it ideal for home office, workstations, and game rooms. The durable cord is 8 ft / 2.4 meters long with a 3-prong angle plug convenient for tight spaces.

Reliable Product and Service: Purchase with confidence. Check out the full specs: 6,000 volts maximum spike voltage, 15A AC, 125V, and 1875W. Each outlet has a safety slide lock to close unused sockets safeguarding you and your kids.

Multi-Outlet Surge Protector Power Strip: Power everything on your desk with a single compact surge-protected extension cord. This reputable power cord offers 12 AC outlets with surge protector for charging your computer, laptop, phone, camera, and more. One charging station for a clutter-free desk.
Power Bar with Phone Line Protection: Featuring a 1-in-2-out RJ11 telephone or fax protection to ensure open and continuous phone line connections. It also provides a coaxial cable protection to safeguard cable box and satellite connections. The damage-resistant housing protects circuits from fire, impact, and rust.
Safeguard Your Devices and Appliances: The electric strip has a 3,940-Joule energy rating providing a reliable power extension cord to protect printers, broadband modems, or home theater systems. It secures your electronic devices from overload, short circuit, power spikes, lightning strikes, or fluctuations.
Compact, Heavy Duty, and Space-Saving: The widely spaced outlets give ample area to fit big plugs and charger bricks. Its slender design makes it ideal for home office, workstations, and game rooms. The durable cord is 8 ft / 2.4 meters long with a 3-prong angle plug convenient for tight spaces.
Reliable Product and Service: Purchase with confidence as it is backed by a limited lifetime warranty and protected by a dollar 200,000 Connected Equipment Warranty. Check out the full specs: 6,000 volts maximum spike voltage, 15A AC, 125V, and 1875W. Each outlet has a safety slide lock to close unused sockets safeguarding you and your kids.

From the brand

Light Bulbs

Outdoor LED Spotlight

Outdoor Lamp

EDISHINE has been focusing on the unity of practicality and decorativeness. Dedicated to banish the darkness and bring light to millions of families, while making your living space more beautiful and cozy. Specializing in indoor and outdoor lighting fixtures such as floor lamps, pendant lamps, table lamps, ceiling lamps, wall lamps, floodlights and more, meeting all your lighting needs from spacious front door to narrow bedside table.

【Flexible & Stable】Equipped with 6ft SJTW 18/3C extension cord, this outdoor plug in flood light is flexible enough to offer greater installation range without extra extension cord, easy for you to plug it into any polarized outlet; the included ground stake helps to keep fixture more stable
【Easy to Install & Adjustable Head】Just use the screw and nut cap to connect the ground stake, then put your bulb (not included) into the socket; you can adjust the direction of the flood light head by adjusting the screw to change the direction of the light, meet your different illumination needs
【E26 Socket】 E26 base only supports maximum of 150W PAR38 bulbs (bulbs not included); with high quality ceramic lamp base, our outdoor flood light fixture is high temperature resistance and durable, eliminating the hassle of frequent bulb replacement and saving your money
【Wide Application & Warranty】The outdoor flood light holders have passed the wet location test, can be used in humid environments and weather, ideal for yard, patio, flag, holiday decor; UL listed and 1-Year Warranty provided, our service team is always glad to help you within 24 hours





EDISHINE is a professional manufacturer specializing in Home Improvement and Indoor & Outdoor Lightings. Our primary aim is to provide you and other valuable members with higher quality products, A satisfying shopping experience is amongst our top priorities.

Outdoor Light Socket

Decorate Your Yard

Heavily weatherproof and waterproof performance floodlights made of sturdy material with shock-resistant closed lens housing that can withstand rain, snow, sleet, dirt, and dust in the outdoors.

120° Adjustable neck allows for the proper angle without the hassle repositioning.

Warm Tips:

This outdoor light does not contain bulbs, only par38 bulbs are used to ensure the waterproofness of the light.

  • Specification:
  • Input Voltage:120Vac, 60Hz
  • Waterproof:IP65
  • Meterial:Die-cast Aluminum
  • Recommended bulb type: par38 bulb (max 150W)

Read more




Flexible Angle

The Head of outdoor flood spotlight could be adjusted up to 120°，while if you want to adjust its angle, just loosen the nut, adjust the angle, and then tighten it.

Heavy Duty Cord

6 ft SJTW 18/3C heavy duty extension cord and the standard ground plug allow it to install directly instead of complex wiring, just plug it in in seconds and then enjoy your new yard after night falls.

Suitable for Any Weather

Only par38 bulbs with E26 base, maximum power 150W. The par38 bulb can be tightly fitted with the waterproof rubber ring to avoid the flooding of the outdoor light cocket.

Read more

Product Description

Use Upgraded Solar Panel

Our solar security lights equipped with newest monocrystalline silicon solar panel,up to 25% conversion rate,which can shorten the charging time. built in large capacity 2400 mah rechargeable battery,ensure Longer lighting time.

With Remote Control

Solar powered lights comes with a remote controller,you can turn on/off the light and select different modes by remote control without having to climb up on a ladder(NOTE: please take out the clear insulation sheet first when you use the remote control)

Weatherproof & Durable

Crafted from corrosion resistant ABS plastic and protected by the IP65 waterproof, The lifespan of light will be up to 50,000hours. you can install solar flood lights anywhere as you like, such as gardens, pergola, terraces, driveways, gates,backyard etc

Super Bright Lighting

Solar motion sensor lights equipped with 300 super bright LED light beads,It can produce up to 3000lm 7000K brightness, suitable as security lighting for your home.

5 Rotatable Lighting Heads

Solar wall lights has 5 swiveling lighting heads,the adjustable lamp cap can freely move up and down, left and right,which can meet various angles of irradiation.

Easy Setup

The solar led outdoor lights are easy installation, no annoying wires connect or adapters,only using the included screws to fix on any exterior & interior wall or all types of material including metal, wood or plastic.

2023 Newest Solar Lights For Outside Inside House – Super Bright LED Motion Detection Floodlights with 5 Lighting Heads

Warm Tips

1. When the solar panel is unplugged from the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2, mode 3 and mode 4 can work both at day and night.

2. When the solar panel is plugged into the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2 and mode 3 only works at night, the mode 4 can work both at day and night.

Note:

1. Please turn the solar motion sensing lights power switch to the “ON” position before first time using. then press the gear switch or use remote control to adjust the lighting mode.

2. The angle and direction of motion sensor should be adjusted to the best position, so that motion detecting lights has the largest detection range and the recommended height is 6-11 feet.

Upgraded 4 Lighting Modes: solar motion activated light has 4 lighting modes: Mode 1: the light turn on for 20s when detected movement at night. Mode 2: light turns on in dim mode at night, get brighter for 20s when detected movement. Mode 3: the light will always turn on and stay medium light at night with or without detecting motion. Mode 4: light turns on for 20 seconds when detects movements both in daytime and night.
Innovative 5 Lighting Heads Design: our solar wall lamps is equipped with 5 rotating lighting heads and pivoting solar panels,it can move up and down, left and right, easily adjust the lamp cap,solar panel and motion sensor to any angles as your requirement,up to 360° wide lighting angle,bring you a fantastic lighting experience.
Ultra Bright with 300LED Solar Power Lights: with 300 super bright LED light beads,It can produce up to 3000lm 7000K high brightness output,which can fully achieve the brightness required by daily life. equipped with upgraded PIR motion sensor, solar spot lights can detect up to 120 degree with a longer sensor length of 28feet,motion detection solar lights can sense people,animal,cars etc.
All Weather Resistant: solar garden lights is made of durable high-strength ABS material,reaching IP65 waterproof level,which can withstand many kinds of extreme weather, such as snow, frost,rain and high temperature etc,great led exterior flood lights for fence, balcony, pathway, patio,porch,deck,street,stairs,steps,yard etc





Use Upgraded Solar Panel

Our solar security lights equipped with newest monocrystalline silicon solar panel,up to 25% conversion rate,which can shorten the charging time. built in large capacity 2400 mah rechargeable battery,ensure Longer lighting time.

With Remote Control

Solar powered lights comes with a remote controller,you can turn on/off the light and select different modes by remote control without having to climb up on a ladder(NOTE: please take out the clear insulation sheet first when you use the remote control)

Weatherproof & Durable

Crafted from corrosion resistant ABS plastic and protected by the IP65 waterproof, The lifespan of light will be up to 50,000hours. you can install solar flood lights anywhere as you like, such as gardens, pergola, terraces, driveways, gates,backyard etc

2. When the solar panel is plugged into the solar lamp; lighting mode 1,mode 2 and mode 3 only works at night, the mode 4 can work both at day and night.

Note:

2. The angle and direction of motion sensor should be adjusted to the best position, so that motion detecting lights has the largest detection range and the recommended height is 6-11 feet.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:59:46 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Choose SMALLRT, Choose Safety

SMALLRT is a comprehensive high-tech enterprise dedicated to the research and development, production and sales of sockets such as power strip, outlet extender, power strip tower.

SMALLRT power strip combine safety, practicality and aesthetics, and are suitable for various places such as office, home, hotel and so on.

A. How did we start?

The SMALLRT brand was founded in 2001. It combines safety, practicality and aesthetics. Once the power strip came out, it was favored by many consumers.

B. What makes our products unique?

We focus not only on safety but also on the practicality and aesthetics of our products. The power strip will also be tested at various levels before they leave the factory.

C. Why do we love what we do?

It is our founder’s goal to let everyone use SMALLRT power strip, and it is the work tenet of every SMALLRT person to make every consumer fall in love with our power strip.

【Overload Protection and Surge Protection 】The surge protector power strip will automatically cut power to protect your expensive devices when a voltage surge is detected. The reset/off switch with integrated circuit breaker for overload protection of all outlets. This outlets power strip has 8-overload protection.
【UL Approved Safe and Durable 】The 6FT upgraded extension cord with multiple outlets is UL approved and made of pure copper. Reinforced design at the junction of the stand of power strip tower and the wire head. To protect the terminal from wear and tear. Environmental protection and fire-resistance PC shell with flame retardant at 1382℉ makes it more durable and longer lifetime.
【USB- C Charge Up to 30% Faster 】4 USB ports total 3.4A, each USB A port features 2.4A Max output. USB C charging port features 3A Max. Built-in with smart technology, detecting charging devices and deliver optimal charging speed automatically, compatible with most USB devices.
【16 IN 1 Tower Power Strip with USB】- This power strip tower surge protector with 12 AC outlets and 4 smart USB (1 USB C) charging ports(5V/3.4A) can power up to 16 electronic devices simultaneously. Integrated circuit breaker and 1800 Joules protection rating ensure the safety of your electronics.
【What You will Get】 Power strip with USB ports, Maunal, our worry-free 12-month, our life time technology support and friendly customer service.The steady base with anti-slip mat on the bottom effectively avoid wobbling and slipping around.

In the event of power overload, the reliable safety switch will trip off automatically to protect your devices and your home. The switch on the base is designed to be perfectly loose, to ensure it won’t get stuck after long time of use. Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets is your best chose!

  • Model: ZYC06
  • Rated Voltage: 110-250V~
  • Rated Current: 10A
  • Maximum Power: 250V / 2500W
  • Frequency: 50/60HZ
  • USB-A Output: 5V 2.4A
  • USB C Output: 5V-3A
  • USB Total Output: 5V-3.4A
  • Material: ABS+Firepoof Material
  • Using Temperature: -10℃～+40℃
  • Power cord specification: 3×0.75mm²
  • Safe protect: Overload Protector Mmultiprise Electrique

Reinforcement of Wire Interface to Prevent Wear

The power strip with USB ports cable is made of 100% copper wire, which power strip tower surge protector has a highly conductive and the cable has good flexibility. And the reinforcement design of the tail makes the product more durable.

Read more

Heat Resistant

This fireproof extension cord with USB Ports is made of ABS+PC, whose ignition temperature is as high as 1382℉ and self-extinguishes right away after it is ignited by fire from outside, the highest level fire-retardant material, it’s very safe and value for money.

Anti-slip mat Sturdy and thicked Base

The power strip tower thicked and broadened base with anti-slip mat on the bottom make the power strip town steadier, maximally preventing wobbling and sliding around.

Two-in-one design

It contain Main swith and overload protection in this switch.

At the RESET side, USB-A & USB-C & AC Outlets are at work. protector de sobretensiones protects your home’s expensive equipment

Read more

regulador de energia electrica

Read more

Easy to Carry Travel

Size: 6 * 5 * 3.5

Strong product stability. The unique design makes the surge protector tower easy to carry. Small footprint. You can take it anywhere.

Product Description

The Cable Clips are made of 100% silicone, which is non-toxic, non-magnetic, anti-static, and flexible. Once you insert the cable into a slot, it won’t fall out easy at all.
Suitable for holding cables less than 6mm such as computer cables, audio cables, USB charging cables, and network cables.
The double-faced adhesive is very firm and long-lasting and works well in smooth and clean the surface, such as marble, plastic, wood, glass, metal, and rubber.
No more fumbling around on the floor between the sofa and the end table, or between the bed and the nightstand to find the ends of your charging cables.

From the brand

About GAIATOP:

Founded in 2018, GAIATOP is a very young and dynamic family with a complete R&D team – structure, ID design, projects, and a mature operating system.

The company conducts vertical development on sub-categories such as seasonal products – fans – heaters, etc. And builds the company’s exclusive R&D team for large technology categories.

GAIATOP Desk & Hand fan

GAIATOP Bug Zapper & Heater

【4000V 18W High Power Bug Zapper】365nm UV light is deisgned to attract mosquitoes and flying insects. Internal 4000V power mesh can immediately kill them. This mosquito zapper has been upgraded to 18W, which can cover a range of 1500 feet, wider than other 15W coverage.
【IP44 Waterproof Shell Design】With premium IP44 waterproof design, this mosquito trap can be used in balconies, gardens, courtyards and other indoors and outdoors places. Whether it’s sunny or rainy, it provides you with a pest-free environment.
【Safe and Environmental Protection】Not contain pesticides, our mosquito killer is very safe for children and pets. Made of flame retardant and ABS material, this fly zapper features high temperature resistance and non-irritating odor. Equipped with a galvanized steel mesh to avoid electric shock.
【Easy to Clean】Our mosquito killer has a hidden tray at the bottom of the device for storing dead flies, and comes with a pull rod to clean the stainless steel high pressure mesh. Clean Method: Remove the tray and clean it with a brush or rinse it with water.
【What You Get】1X Electric Bug Zapper Outdoor, 1X Instruction Manual, 1X Exquisite Box, 12-month warranty, 7 days/24 hours warm service. Any problem, please don’t hesitate to contact us. We’ll solve it for you immediately.

As a new design in 2022, this bug zapper outdoor has been improved on the basis of the insect killer. There is a hidden tray and a lever at the bottom of the device for cleaning the stainless steel high-pressure mesh. The stretchy waterproof shell resists everyday weather and keeps your family safe from pest bites.

Features

New Design Mosquito Killer Lamp

  • Wide range of applications: can be used in balcony, bedroom, living room, kitchen, garden, hotel, camping, enclosed courtyard and other places.
  • The IP44 waterproof shell resists daily weather. The lamp bulb can be replaced for a long time use.
  • Mosquito Killer comes with a 5ft power cord, allowing it to hang free in the yard and aviding the inconvenience caused by the short power cord.
  • Comes with a pull rod to clean the high-pressure mesh, the mosquito will not stick to the mesh for a long time, to keep it clean and tidy for a long time use.
  • Made of ABS fireproof material, the plastic part of the mosquito zapper is stronger and more durable. The internal 4000V power grid will instantly electrocute mosquitoes and flying insects, providing effective indoor and outdoor pest control.

Product Specifications:

  • Input Voltage: 85 -145V
  • Working Current: 0.18A
  • Area Coverage: 1500sq.ft
  • Bulb Wattage: 18W UV light
  • Power Cord: 5ft
  • Grid Voltage: 4000V

Read more

Insect killer no more taking apart the entire unit to empty your kill; bugs collect in the easy-clean tray (remove so they fall directly to ground).

Keep bug zapper away from people, pets and food by hanging high on a tree, awning or anywhere a hook can mount.

Fly zapper even if it is used outdoors for a long time, the plastic housing is also durable, Prevents accidental finger touch

Read more

Note

1.Please try to reinstall the bulb if it does not light up after plugged in. It might be loose while delivering.

2.The light bulb is a consumable. If the mosquito killer doesn’t work, the light bulb may be broken. Please request to replace the bulb.

3.Please put the electronic bug zapper in a dark place for optimal capture.

4.Unplug the mosquito zapper plug before cleaning. do not touch the electrical grid with wet hand or electricity conducting materials.

5.The insect killer must be placed at least one meter away from the flammable substance such as gasoline and petroleum.

6.Since the interior of the product eliminates mosquitoes through the power grid, please clean it regularly to avoid mosquito accumulation.

7.The device could be hanged. You are suggested to hang it 0.8-1.2m to the floor and at least o.3m to the wall

From the brand

About DEWENWILS

DEWENWILS has maintained scientific rigor to create pragmatic and design-aesthetic products of great value. Specializing in Tools and Home Improvement, Consumer Electronics and Outdoor Equipment,our products range from Timer Series, Outlet Switches and Light Sockets to Extension Wire and Lamps. Since 2016, our products boom globally, bringing intelligent convenience and new energy infusion to your life

Outdoor Timer

Remote Control Outlet

Low Voltage Transformer

Extension cord reel

BRAND VISION

Back to the essence of your home life-simplicity, safety and comfort

WHAT MAKES DEWENWILS UNIQUE

Attach great caution with the whole productionￚeach product has undergone the product development of a full range of ideas, technical parameters adjustment, strict quality control, and revision based on customer feedback.

WE LOVE WHAT WE DO

Enthusiasm and innovation are our eternal driving force.Simplifying home lives and branding growth are our motivation.Sincere feedback and the love of consumers are reasons for persistence.

【WEATHER-RESISTANT CONNECTION】 This waterproof extension cord connector provides a watertight sealed space to protect outdoor & indoor plug connections from the elements like water, snow, rain, dust, and dirt to ensure circuit safety ( Note: It is just water-resistant. Do not submerse it in water)
【AMPLE & AJUSTABLE COMPARTMENT】Large housing holds both multiple connections and one on one connection; compatible with AWG 12/14/16 extension cord and flat cable; slide to adjust the position of the limiter for different lengths of connections
【FIRM AND TIGHT CONNECTION】Rubber seals at both ends conform well to the power cord; 2 clamps hold the cords tightly in place; adjustable anti-slip serrations keep the cords securely connected to prevent the plugs from sliding or disconnecting even if tug the cords in uses
【DOUBLE LOCK & PROTECTION】 The top lid and 4 extra durable latches enhance the sealing of the outdoor extension cord safety seal; 4 lockable latches secure the cord safety seal box fastened for safe use even if the top lid is broken off
【EASY TO USE】 No tools or installation required; place the extension cord properly; slide the limiter to keep cords securely connected; lock the top lid and 4 latches for seal; hanging to save space; ideal for holiday lights, string lights, pool pumps and garden tools etc

DEWENWILS is a professional manufacturer specializing in Home Improvement, Consumer Electronics and Outdoor Equipment. Our primary aim is to provide you and other valuable members with higher quality products. A satisfying shopping experience is amongst our top priorities.

4-Pack DEWENWILS Extension Cord Safety Cover

Protect You and Your Electrical Devices

Seals out water, snow, rain, dust, and dirt, keeps cords dry and together. Ideal for both indoor and outdoor applications like holiday decoration, string lights, water fountains, pool pumps, garden tools, and power tools, etc.

Note: It is just water-resistant. Do not submerge it in water.

Specifications:

Capacity: 12/14/16 Gauge Cords & Flat Cable

Dimension: 8.07 x 2.83 x2.83 Inch

Available colors: Green & Black

  • Package Includes:
  • Extension cord seal cover x 4
  • Limiter x 4
  • Hanger x 4
  • User Manual x 1

Read more

Fits 12/14/16 Gauge Cords & Flat Cable

Ample compartment holds UP TO 12 GAUGE CORDS and FLAT CABLE.

Adjust to fit multiple connections and one on one connections.

Four Lockable Latches

Lock the weatherproof cover in a tighter way with the top lid and 4 extra lockable latches. Creates a higher degree of sealing by double lock way. When the top lid is broken off, the cord safety seal cover can be locked tightly by these latches for safety uses.

Adjustable Limiter

Slide to adjust the limiter for different lengths of connection. 2 Clamps at both ends fix the cord tightly in place.

The anti-slip serrations keep the cords securely connected to prevent plugs from sliding or disconnecting in pulling.
